name: Galactic Conqueror
overview: In the heart of the galaxy, the planet "GALLION" is threatened with invasion !! Only the "CONQUERORS" can avoid the worst. It was after the end of the reunification conflicts on earth that we saw a rebel movement form there, wishing to overthrow peace by engaging in space war. A stellar league as well as very efficient technicians were transferred to the planet " GALLION "considered by the government as a strategic point because of its position in the center of the galaxy. Fifty years were necessary for these technicians to develop an ultra-sophisticated fighter:" THUNDER CLOUD II "(endowed with a power of fire ten thousand times greater than that of its ancestor). The qualities required to pilot this new machine were the technique,
